definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]

(indicates that sth turns out just the opposite of what one would wish) unfortunately/as it happened/(indicates that sth is the opposite of what would be normal or reasonable) stubbornly/contrarily/against reason/(indicates that sb or a group is singled out) precisely/only/of all people

(indicates that sth turns out just the opposite of what one would wish) unfortunately/as it happened/(indicates that sth is the opposite of what would be normal or reasonable) stubbornly/contrarily/against reason/(indicates that sb or a group is singled out) precisely/only/of all people
to prefer/to be partial to sth/preference
partial towards sth/to prefer/to incline/erroneous tendencies (Leftist or Revisionist deviation)
to be partial towards sth/to favor/to prefer/preference/favorite
to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
inclining to the west (e.g. of the sun after noon, indicating lateness of the day)

sentences.english: This paper main studies on the impact of knife gap and run slanting to shear quality.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究剪刃間隙及跑偏對鋼板邊部質量的影響。

sentences.english: These ten are broad and even a bit philosophical.
sentences.chinese: 這十條貼士很寬泛，甚至有一點偏哲學。

sentences.english: All is not well in the world Susie has left behind.
sentences.chinese: 蘇茜走後的世界，一切都跑偏了軌道。

sentences.english: A city of eastern Netherlands on the lower Rhine River east-southeast of Utrecht.
sentences.chinese: 荷蘭東部城市，位於萊茵河下游烏得勒支東南偏東部。

sentences.english: The figure in Japanese hybrid tended to be higher.
sentences.chinese: 以日系雜交原種有偏高的傾向。

sentences.english: That's where that term comes from, du/dV dV/dT.
sentences.chinese: 乘以偏V偏T，p恆定，這項的來源。

sentences.english: That's where that term comes from, du/dV dV/dT.
sentences.chinese: 乘以偏V偏T，p恆定，這項的來源。

sentences.english: In this paper, asymmetric microporous poly (vinylidene fluoride) (PVDF)membranes were prepared by phase-inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用相轉換法制備了聚偏氟乙烯不對稱微孔膜。

sentences.english: Colours are another popular area for experiments that yield toned-down shades like lilac, apricot or brown.
sentences.chinese: 流行顏色偏柔和，如紫丁香，杏色或棕色。

sentences.english: The particle exhaust of Fusion Experimental Breeder FEB E is carried out with divertor.
sentences.chinese: 的粒子抽除是通過偏濾器進行的。

sentences.english: It was believed that segregation distortion usually arose with gametic selection genes or sterility genes.
sentences.chinese: 多數偏分離位點存在配子體選擇基因或育性相關基因。

sentences.english: He tried to bow his fiddle but always missed.
sentences.chinese: 他試着用弓拉小提琴，但總是拉偏了。

sentences.english: The fruit looks similar to raspberries, but are more orange in color.
sentences.chinese: 果實與覆盆子相近，但顏色更偏橘黃。

sentences.english: Second, place your fist in the upper waist.
sentences.chinese: 第二，把拳頭放在前腰偏上方。

sentences.english: You will be responsible for any problem, because you do not listen to our well-intentioned words.
sentences.chinese: 我們好言相勸你偏不聽，出什麼差錯你自己負責。

sentences.english: How is strange, his arrow is all agonic.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪呀，他的箭一點都不偏。

definition: partial towards sth/to prefer/to incline/erroneous tendencies (Leftist or Revisionist deviation)
to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to incline to/to prefer/to be prone to
to be partial towards sth/to favor/to prefer/preference/favorite
to act cleverly to get what one desires/to get the best at least expense
light (of food, not greasy or strongly flavored)/insipid/slack (sales)
